src:
RI Kirim 26 Eksportir ke Pameran Dagang di China
01 Nov 2019, 11:33 by Vadhia Lidyana


Foto: Grandyos Zafna

Jakarta - Sebanyak 26 perusahaan Indonesia akan memasarkan produk-produknya di China International Import Expo (CIIE), Shanghai, pada tanggal 5-10 November 2019. Nantinya, berbagai produk RI mulai dari elektronik, kendaraan, pakaian, aksesoris, produk pertanian seperti sawit, makanan, batu bara, sarang burung walet, peralatan medis dan produk perawatan medis bakal dijajakan di China."Pada 5-10 November Kemendag akan berpartisipasi mengikuti CIIE 2019. Dari Indonesia ada 17 perusahaan yang ikut kami, dan 9 perusahaan mendaftar mandiri. Yang akan ditampilkan berbagai produk yang bersifat high end intellegent equipment, elektronik dan aplliance, otomotif, food an agri product, medical product, apparel, termasuk sektor jasa," tutur Direktur Jenderal Pengembangan Ekspor Nasional (PEN) Dody Edward di kantornya, Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).Dalam perhelatan dagang internasional ini, Indonesia akan bersaing dengan 171 negara lainnya."Pameran ini akan menampilkan produk impor dari 172 negara dan ditargetkan dikunjungi lebih dari 150.000 orang," kata Dody.Adapun perusahaan yang akan ikut mejeng di CIIE 2019 ini di antaranya adalah 0ermata Hijau Group, Putra Putri Jaya, Sosro, Anugerah Citra Walet, Indofood, BPDP-KS, Mayora, dan sebagainya.Dody mengatakan, tujuan dari mengikuti CIIE 2019 ini yakni mendongkrak ekspor ke China. Pasalnya, China sendiri merupakan pasar ekspor terbesar Indonesia. Sedangkan, Indonesia di mata China merupakan negara terbesar ke-16 yang mengimpor ke China."Ini kesempatan negara mitra dagang China termasuk Indonesia, di mana kita supplier pemasok 16 besar bagi China. Dan bagi kita, China adalah pasar ekspor terbesar. Karena ini pameran dedikasinya adalah impor, ini gesture China bahwa mereka negara yang terbuka. Jadi pasarnya itu dipasok oleh berbagai produk-produk impor selain mereka kuat dengan produk-produk sendiri," imbuh dia. Simak Video "Berorientasi Ekspor, Jokowi Goda China untuk Investasi"[Gambas:Video 20detik](dna/dna)
text:
RI Sends 26 Exporters to Trade Shows in China
01 Nov 2019, 11:33 by Vadhia Lidyana


Photo: Grandyos Zafna

Jakarta - A total of 26 Indonesian companies will market their products at the China International Import Expo (CIIE), Shanghai, on 5-10 November 2019. Later, various Indonesian products ranging from electronics, vehicles, clothing, accessories, agricultural products such as palm oil, food, coal, swallow's nests, medical equipment and medical care products will be sold in China. "On 5-10 November the Ministry of Trade will participate in CIIE 2019. From Indonesia, 17 companies will join us, and 9 companies will register independently. displayed various products that are high end intelligent equipment, electronics and appliance, automotive, food and agri products, medical products, apparel, including the service sector, "said Director General of National Export Development (PEN) Dody Edward at his office, Jakarta, Friday (1 / 11/2019).In this international trade event, Indonesia will compete with 171 other countries. "This exhibition will display imported products from 172 countries and It is targeted to be visited by more than 150,000 people, "said Dody. As for the companies that will participate in CIIE 2019, among them are 0 Green Eyes Group, Putra Putri Jaya, Sosro, Anugerah Citra Walet, Indofood, BPDP-KS, Mayora, and so on. said, the purpose of following the 2019 CIIE was to boost exports to China. Because, China itself is Indonesia's largest export market. Meanwhile, Indonesia in the eyes of China is the 16th largest country importing into China. "This is an opportunity for China's trading partner countries including Indonesia, where we are the top 16 supplier for China. And for us, China is the largest export market. Because this is an exhibition His dedication is import, this is China's gesture that they are an open country. So the market is supplied by a variety of imported products besides they are strong with their own products, "he added. Check out the video "Export-Oriented, Jokowi Teases China for Investment" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (dna / dna)
